\usepackage{caption}

\usepackage{xcolor}

\usepackage{figurex}

\usepackage{hyperref}

\usepackage[backend=biber,style=apa]{biblatex}



\begin{document}


	\textbf{Bold }not bold



	\emph{Italic}



	\underline{Underline}



	\sout{Strikethrough}



	\textsubscript{subscript}



	\textsuperscript{superscript}



	\colorbox{yellow}{highlight yellow}



	{\color{FF0000}red text}



	\fbox{border}






\end{document}
